title: Saracens leave massive imprint on Rugby World Cup even as salary cap investigation threatens club’s cachet
text:
This is a column that comes with an asterisk, a warning that all the fine things you read below about Saracens and their nurturing of players, their massive presence at this Rugby World Cup across several countries and their belief in good people making for good players, is underscored by the fact that salary cap investigators will soon deliver findings into the club’s spending.

If they are found guilty of transgressions, it would put an indelible stain on their reputation. There’s the asterisk, and it is a large one. Do not ignore but also do not let it be your only view of what is one of the finest sporting institutions in the land.

Saracens have nine players in the England squad preparing...
description: This is a column that comes with an asterisk, a warning that all the fine things you read below about Saracens and their nurturing of players, their massive presence at this Rugby World Cup across several countries and their belief in good people making for good players, is underscored by the fact that salary cap investigators will soon deliver findings into the club’s spending.
